features: {Whole-home Coverage & Flexible Installation}: automatic networking, easily implement whole house WiFi coverage, with 4 x Internal antennas and MU-MIMO technology, it devotes to improve WiFi range and signal stability throughout your home, extend coverage up to 3, 000 sq.ft

{Easymesh Technology & Seamless Roaming}: EasyMesh allows various devices to form the "Everything Mesh" Wifi system. It can easily extend connectivity to up to 84 devices. Rather than wifi range extender that need multiple network names and passwords, WS-WN535M1 allows you to enjoy seamless roaming throughout the house, with a single network name and password.

{Easy Setup & Secure WiFi Connection}: Connect to your modem and power, then download and lauch the Wavink app, next connect your modem to the router and finally you should follow the instructions to operate. With the WPA2-PSK encryption, you will leave away from hackers and bad websites.

{Smart Connection & Dual-Band WLAN}: Simultaneous 5G 867Mbps and 2.4G 300Mbps connections for 1200Mbps of total available bandwidth and it will automatically find the best path and connection for every device.
device. {Worry-free Purchase}: We provide 1-year worry-free warranty and life-long friendly customer service and technical support.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: WiFi Coverage Wavlink Mesh WiFi System, AC1200 Wireless Access Point,Dual-Band, Full Gigabit, MU-MIMO,Wave 2, 2.4GHz/300Mbps+5GHz/867Mbps WLAN, touchlink, Supports 802.11ac/a/n/g/b standards The Mesh Router, automatically recognized as Router Mode after the Device is connected to the Internet. While other Devices are connected to Mesh Router, automatically become Extender. Whole-Home Mesh WiFi System for home networking, with it's multiple smart units, delivers data speeds up to 1200Mbps and provides seamless floor-to-floor roaming throughout your home. While signals of traditional individual router significantly decrease after crossing two or three walls, this Whole-Home Mesh WiFi System, a distributed wireless network, is interconnected and does not sacrifice signal strength and stability within a much larger area, which is highly-valued.

Extendable WiFi Coverage 1000-1500 square feet coverage with one kit, you can extend it depending on your needs (up to adding 8 satellites). For example, covering an area of 3000-4000 square feet with three units for which WiFi can easily cover three floors of the house without any dead zones in the home, such as the bedroom, basement, garage, garden, etc. It is an ideal choice for your houses, apartments and offices to freely arrange the quantity needed and position being placed. Multiple Devices Connections You can connect multiple devices up to 84 on the network without stress, enjoying a seamless network speed, and with Beamforming and the MU-MIMO technology, the device improves the operational efficiency and reduces more buffering when multiple other devices work at the same time. Mesh Technology Enables different brands of Mesh Router, AP, and Repeater to work together——Not only the devices of Wavlink's own brand that support Mesh technology can be networked together (mesh network), but also can be used with other manufacturers' that support Mesh. The flexibility of Mesh can effectively self-optimize the network, maximize the network status and operating performance, and greatly and conveniently expand the network coverage.

Parental Control WN535M supports parental control mode, which mainly involves time limit and web site filtering.This feature allows you to reasonably allocate your child's online time, block unhealthy websites, and establish a healthy lifestyle for your child. Let a good Internet environment enhance the quality of life of the whole family rather than leting any negative factors impact it. Adaptive Path Selection Fastest Path Chosen Automatically for Device Connections. With Beamforming and the MU-MIMO technology, the device improves the efficiency and reduces more buffering when multiple other devices work at the same time wihtout sacrificing the signal strength and stability within a much larger area, which is highly-valued. Single SSID A single SSID that supports seamless roaming: The home WiFi system replaces your router and repeater, creates only one SSID in the home, and provides a seamless WiFi network. Keep your device always connected to the nearest grid cell and select the fastest frequency band.

Dual-Band Technology Aggregated Speeds up to 1167Mbps. Perfect for HD Video Streaming and Gaming with No More Buffering. The entire home WiFi system combines dual-band (2.4GHz + 5GHz) speeds up to 1167Mbps. Just enjoy your carefree and seamless leisure time. This 535M1 Mesh, with its delicate white color and smooth line design, is definitely a perfect home decor in addition to exert its role in providing a great Internet environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unreliable Product Paired With Complicated Refund Process
reviews.reviewText: Okay, here's the deal. I ordered the WAVLINK Mesh WiFi system twice, and both times it let me down. The first unit I got was a complete bust right out of the box. I reached out to the seller, and they told me they’d refund me if I ordered a new one. Seemed like a decent deal, so I went for it. They even said not to bother sending the first one back, which at the time, I was cool with. I got the second unit, and it seemed to work just fine initially. But here’s the twist - instead of refunding me for the first purchase, they refunded me for the second one. Ugh!Fast forward a bit, after using the mesh system for a while, my internet started acting like a rebellious teenager, going on and off whenever it wanted, turning my online gaming sessions into a frustration fest. After some poking around and troubleshooting, it was pretty clear - this mesh system was the culprit. I decided to return it while I was still within the return window, but now it’s been a few weeks, and my refund is playing hide-and-seek.Now, I can’t help but wonder if the refund for the second unit instead of the first was a mistake or maybe it was done on purpose, in case something like this happened. Whatever the case, it's a mess.I'm just throwing this out there for anyone considering buying the WAVLINK Mesh WiFi - be cautious. The system didn’t live up to its hype, and now, getting my money back feels like chasing a rainbow. Seriously, who needs this kind of drama? So, if you don’t want to go through what I did, maybe look for another WiFi solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Reliable network. Eliminated kids Xbox WiFi woes.
reviews.reviewText: These on the whole have been great. We ha e two teenage sons who constantly play on their Xboxes with their mates, as well as having their phones on face time (I don’t know why - I just pay the bills and enjoy the peace) and before these little cubes they used to whinge every day that they’d lost signal in the middle of an important game. I know - those poor little cherubs and their first world problems.Anyway fast forward 7 months into ownership of this bad boys and problem solved. They seem to carry the signal around the house well and we’ve seen a massive improvement.I also like the fact you can split out the 2.4 and 5.0ghz signals as well as have an easy push button guest WiFi network so you haven’t got people asking for the password.All in all very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: Problems not as easy to setup as others but at the price point can it been beaten?
reviews.reviewText: I have sky internet, they took a bit of setting up.This is how I set it up with my sky router.Firstly youneed to disable the sky routers built in WiFi, connect the Wavlink via a Ethernet cable to the sky router. Set wan on the Wavlink to the same subnet as the sky router and switch dhcp off on your sky router.I then created a new subnet on my Wavlink network and enabled dhcp on the Wavlink router after giving the Wavlink router a static address.Once I successfully connected to the Wavlink router via dhcp I configured the secondary Wavlink box via the Wavlink routers webpage.It's given us good WiFi all across the house without any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Signal Wasn't very strong and it didn't last a year.Luckily amazon gave me the money back and I replaced with an eero system...and WOW, now that is a system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 16, 2019
reviews.reviewText: We've had a few issues recently with WiFi dropping in and out throuout the house, we also had issues finding a few recent smart devices due to changing networks on WiFi extenders around the house. This has finally been resolved, we have a reasonably large home with 4 bedrooms and these 2 have covered almost the whole home without any issues, now more dropped points wherever we are and no more switching between networks, they're reasonably easy to setup if you have the know how and very easy to just plug in and get going. My main issue was having to change all my passwords over but that was only needed once then all sorted.
